flawed_nl_solution:
20 x 1/4 = <<20*1/4=80/1>>80/1 dolphins are fully trained.
So, 20 - 80/1 = <<20-80/1=-60>>-60 dolphins are not yet fully trained.
-60 x 2/3 = <<-60*2/3=-40>>-40 are currently in training.
Therefore, -60 - -40 = <<-60--40=-20>>-20 dolphins will be trained next month.
#### -20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 80/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
